name: ARC Continuum
description: ARC Continuum is an action/adventure game set on a new sci-fi world rich with ancient history that has been violently occupied by the vicious alien Kasaar race. Use the ARC to slow, rewind or manipulate the flow of time and liberate your homeworld.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit or Later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit or Later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 3.5 GHz or faster Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 or AMD Storage: 5 GB available space
